item.title: Hello World
item.description: As Rich Lucas recently said, it seems somewhat anachronistic to start a blog in 2017, but here I amâ€¦ doing it anyway. Well, I worry that starting a blog in 2017 is a bit like creating a myspace page in 2010, but here goes: https://t.co/12RevfumqL — Rich Lucas (@rlucas11) May 2, 2017 The main reason why I started this blog was probably because I enjoy reading other blogs. So instead of doing the obligatory blog roll section, I will simply write about some blogs that I like.
